[enemy]
# 2 snakes
type=snake
location=4,5,1,5
level=1,1
number=2,2

[enemy]
# 2 Ghosts
type=ghost
location=9,5,1,5
level=1,1
number=2,2

[event]
# Chest
type=on_trigger
location=2,5,1,1
hotspot=location
loot=3,2,6,fixed,2
mapmod=object,2,5,206
tooltip=Chest

[event]
# Chest
type=on_trigger
location=2,9,1,1
hotspot=location
loot=1,3,9,fixed,1;2,3,10,fixed,1
mapmod=object,2,9,206
tooltip=Chest

[event]
# Teleport to Castle4
type=on_trigger
location=31,10,1,4
intermap=maps/castle4.txt,1,16
